meanings.definition: A pair of outer garments covering each leg separately and usually extending from the waist to the ankle.
meanings.sent1: I wore my pantalones to the party last night.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of pantalones for work.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to climb the curtains but got stuck in my pantalones instead.
meanings.sent4: His pantalones were like two pillars supporting his outfit.
meanings.sent5: The bright red pantalones stood out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: My favorite pantalones are the blue ones.
meanings.sent2: He ironed his pantalones before the job interview.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel thought my pantalones were a tree and tried to climb them.
meanings.sent4: Her pantalones were a shield against the cold wind.
meanings.sent5: In the play, the hero always wore his lucky pantalones.
